attributes.action: End the private testing that is required to travel in and out of the UK
attributes.additional_details: The UK government are restricting residents to travel in and out of the UK by allowing private test providers to be the ONLY source of covid-19 test results. As UK residents we have access to a free NHS testing service that provides antigen and PCR. We have used the NHS as test providers throughout the pandemic and these have been suffice to confirm whether or not a person has COVID-19. Why must we pay for private testing to fly when we have a free service that provides the same service.
attributes.background: To scrap private companies being the only providers to prove test results that allow UK residents to travel in and out of the UK.
